title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
synopsis: A reclusive Hollywood icon finally tells her story to an unknown journalist, revealing decades of secrets and lies.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
synopsis: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones through tiny changes that deliver remarkable results.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
synopsis: Between life and death there is a library, and within that library, the shelves go on forever. Every book provides a chance to try another life you could have lived.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
synopsis: A stunning blend of adventure and mysticism, environmentalism and politics, this novel set on the desert planet Arrakis is considered one of the greatest achievements in science fiction.

title: The Housemaid
author: Freida McFadden
synopsis: A psychological thriller about a housemaid who discovers dark secrets about the family she works for.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
synopsis: A lone astronaut must save humanity from extinction in this brilliant hard science fiction adventure.

title: The Thursday Murder Club
author: Richard Osman
synopsis: In a peaceful retirement village, four unlikely friends meet weekly to investigate cold cases. But when a brutal murder occurs on their very doorstep, the Thursday Murder Club find themselves in the middle of their first live case.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
synopsis: A memoir about a young girl who, kept out of school, leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge University.

title: The Song of Achilles
author: Madeline Miller
synopsis: A tale of gods, kings, immortal fame and the human heart, The Song of Achilles is a dazzling literary feat that brilliantly reimagines Homer's enduring masterwork, The Iliad.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
synopsis: A woman's act of violence against her husband and her refusal to speak sends shock waves through London. A psychotherapist becomes obsessed with treating her.
